text.section: Subject to the notice and hearing provisions of Title 10, Subtitle 2 of the State Government Article, the Division may bring a civil administrative action against a person that violates § 4.5-501(a) of this subtitle.

After a hearing, if the Division finds that a person has violated § 4.5-501(a) of this subtitle, the Division may:
order the person to cease and desist from unlawful practice; and
impose a civil penalty of not more than $1,000 for each day of unlawful practice.
Any party aggrieved by a decision and order of the Division under this section may file an appeal as provided under §§ 10-222 and 10-223 of the State Government Article.
